reviews.review_msg: Daily vocabulary quizzes with fair tests. Very good at explaining the grammar and the group activities are very fun.

She is probably the best professor I have ever had in my time at SFU. She's kind, caring, and takes the time to explain things if you need it. I cannot recommend German 100 enough. She does vocabulary quizzes every class, however she HANDMAKES the Quizlets for you to study them. Take this class!!! So long as you try, you'll get an A.

One of the best professors I have had at SFU! She really cares for her students and makes learning German super fun. Claudia's lectures are engaging and interactive. Attending lecture really helped me absorb the material and made exams easy to study for.

Dr. Hein was one of the best profs I've had at SFU. She is caring and makes learning German as fun as it can be. I always looked forward to her classes and I am sad I won't be able to take more. I highly recommend taking any German class with Claudia.

Claudia is an absolute gem of a prof. She genuinely wants her students to do well and is so caring--lots of participation marks are available as well as daily vocab quizzes. Her tests are fair taken straight from the outline she gives you and she's so so nice when answering questions regardless of what you ask. 100000/10 recommend taking her!
